entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of thundershowers in the evening. Fog patches. Amount possibly more than 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
